comments.raw_text: When using Polarion ALM and trying entering text in a dropdown/search box the cursor jumps back to the start after entering the second character. This behaviour accurs since Firefox 5. Chrome and IE handle this correctly. To reproduct go to http://www.polarion.com/products/trackwiki/demo.php and create a guest account. Enter into the system and create a test project. In the test project create a task and try to assign it to a person. There you will se the behaviour.
comments.creator: thomas.andreas.winkler@gmail.com
